faqs.question: How to contact with Customer Service?
faqs.answer: For payment, we accept Credit Cards, PayPal and as well as you can pay at door.

faqs.question: I am completely alien to everything that is technology. Can I adopt Foody?
faqs.answer: Foody is exactly for you, it has flexible structure, you can easily order whatever dishes you want.

faqs.question: How long is delivery time?
faqs.answer: Delivery time varies by location and by time of day. However, you will be notified when your order is ready or when it is picked up.

faqs.question: What Payment method can I use?
faqs.answer: For payment, we accept Credit Cards, PayPal and as well as you can pay at door.

faqs.question: What are your delivery Hours?
faqs.answer: Our delivery hour is from 10:00 AM  to 11PM.
